c74object.name: abc.hoa.grain~
c74object.description: abc.hoa.grain~ is an High Order Ambisonics (HOA) granulator process. This object have two modes : syn and fx and man. The fx mode applies granulator to the ambisonics channels and the syn mode generates spatial granulated components from one mono signal at a given ambisonic order N.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.digest: The ambisonic order of the decorrelation process
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: sets the mode of granulation. Possible values: 'fx' and 'syn'.

attribute.name: grainsize
attribute.description: sets the grainsize window in msec, also sets maximum size of grain [init=400:min=2:max=3000: step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the grainsize window in msec

attribute.name: deltime
attribute.description: sets the delay time window in msec, also sets maximum size of delay [init=100:min=2:max=5000:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the delay time window in msec

attribute.name: feedback
attribute.description: sets the feedback amont value between 0 and 1, 0 means no feedback [init=0, min=0, max=1, step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the feedback factor value between 0 and 0.99

attribute.name: rarefaction
attribute.description: sets the rarefaction of grain, 1 means no grain [init=0.5:min=0:max=1:step=0.001]

method.name: grainsize
